title: Mad Men Theme Song
What Happened To The MAD MEN Actors After 18 Years?
description:
MAD MEN (2007) - Then and Now UPDATE - CAST 18 years AFTER
Today, we're taking a trip back in time to revisit the unforgettable faces of Mad Men, the series that immersed us in the glamour (and chaos) of the 1960s advertising world. 

Who could forget the enigmatic Don Draper, the elegant Betty, the sharp-tongued Roger, or the ambitious Peggy? 

The cast captivated audiences for seven seasons, but what happened next? 

Some stayed in the spotlight, while others took unexpected career paths. Get ready to see where they started, what they did after, and where they are now. 


So hit that like button, subscribe, and let's dive in!
Mad Men Then and Now
Mad Men 18 years after
Mad Men 2007
Mad Men TV Show
Mad Men cast
What Happened

channel_title: What To Watch Movies & TV Shows
description:
The coolest TV shows of all time to stream right now - part 10.

Mad Men (2007‚Äì2015).

If you're looking for a drama-filled show? Then this one is for you. 

The series is set in 1960s New York and follows alpha male Don Draper, who works in a prominent ad agency and struggles to keep up with the high-pressure world of Madison Avenue.

Aside from being a successful businessman in the advertising industry, Don is also a family guy with young children.

Madmen is a show that does not worry about political correctness; the creator of the show intends to immerse you in Don's life and his search for success and happiness.

With 92 episodes spanning over seven seasons, you'll have around 92 hours to binge. This trip is definitely worth the time, with an IMDB rating of 8.7. The show is available to stream on Amazon Prime Video.

Christina Hendricks Vintage Bracelet Screen Used Prop from Mad Men TV Show
description:
Christina Hendricks Vintage Bracelet Screen Used Prop from Mad Men TV Show


This is another prop from the TV show Mad Men. This is the first of several pieces of jewelry I have that was worn by Christina Hendricks, who plays Joan Harris. 


Learn more about her here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christina_Hendricks
From Wikipedia: Christina Rene Hendricks (born May 3, 1975) is an American actress and former model. With an extensive career on screen and stage, she has received various accolades, including two Screen Actors Guild Awards and two Critics' Choice Awards, as well as nominations for six Primetime Emmy Awards. She is known for her role as Joan Harris on the critically acclaimed AMC period drama series, Mad Men (2007‚Äì2015). In 2010, a poll of female readers taken by Esquire magazine named her "the sexiest woman in the world". She was also voted "Best Looking Woman in America."

Learn more about Mad Men here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mad_Men
From Wikipedia: Mad Men is an American period drama television series created by Matthew Weiner and produced by Lionsgate Television. It ran on cable network AMC from July 19, 2007, to May 17, 2015, with seven seasons and 92 episodes. It is set during the period of March 1960 to November 1970.

Mad Men begins at the fictional Sterling Cooper advertising agency on Madison Avenue in Manhattan, New York City, and continues at the new firm of Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce (later named Sterling Cooper & Partners) in the Time-Life Building at 1271 Sixth Avenue. According to the pilot episode, the term "Mad men" was coined in the 1950s by advertisers working on Madison Avenue to refer to themselves, "Mad" being short for "Madison".

title: Mad Men TV Show Screen Used Prop; Sally Draper (Kiernan Shipka) Deco Vintage Scarf
description:
Mad Men TV Show Screen Used Prop; Sally Draper (Kiernan Shipka) Deco Vintage Scarf

This is another screen used prop from a TV show. The funny thing is, this is a popular TV show that I have never watched; but I probably will watch it someday. This is a vintage scarf worn by Sally Draper who is played by Kiernan Shipka.


Learn more about Kiernan Shipka here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kiernan_Shipka
From Wikipedia: Kiernan Brennan Shipka (born November 10, 1999) is an American actress. She is best known for her roles as Sally Draper in the AMC drama series Mad Men (2007‚Äì2015), and Sabrina Spellman in the Netflix fantasy series Chilling Adventures of Sabrina (2018‚Äì2020) and the sixth season of The CW series Riverdale (2021‚Äì2022).
In addition to supporting roles in films such as Longlegs, Twisters, and The Last Showgirl (all in 2024), Shipka has also had starring roles in The Blackcoat's Daughter (2015), Totally Killer (2023), and Sweethearts (2024), among others.

Learn more about Mad Men here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mad_Men
From Wikipedia: Mad Men is an American period drama television series created by Matthew Weiner and produced by Lionsgate Television. It ran on cable network AMC from July 19, 2007, to May 17, 2015, with seven seasons and 92 episodes. It is set during the period of March 1960 to November 1970.

Chilling Adventures of Sabrina: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chilling_Adventures_of_Sabrina_(TV_series)
From Wikipedia: Chilling Adventures of Sabrina is an American supernatural horror television series developed by Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa for Netflix, based on the Archie comic book series of the same name. It ran from October 2018 to December 2020 for two seasons (split in four parts). The series is produced by Warner Bros. Television, in association with Berlanti Productions and Archie Comics. Aguirre-Sacasa and Greg Berlanti serve as executive producers, alongside Sarah Schechter, Jon Goldwater, and Lee Toland Krieger.

Mad Men , the thought-provoking and brilliantly written slow burner about life in New York during the 60s , packed with golden quotes and memorable characters .

Least Favs : "Ladies Room" , "Marriage Of Figaro"

8/10

This is just my opinion .

Mad Men is a critically acclaimed TV show that aired from 2007 to 2015. Created by Matthew Weiner, it explores the lives of advertising professionals in 1960s New York, focusing on themes like identity, ambition, and societal change. The show won numerous awards, including multiple Emmys, and is celebrated for its writing, performances, and historical accuracy.

Sally Draper, portrayed by Kiernan Shipka, is one of the show's standout characters. She is the daughter of Don Draper (Jon Hamm) and Betty Draper (January Jones). Sally's journey reflects the struggles of growing up in a turbulent family during a transformative era. Kiernan Shipka's performance was widely praised, earning her recognition as a talented young actress. Shipka has expressed interest in revisiting Sally Draper's story in a potential spin-off2.

What do you think of Sally's character arc?

title: Mad Men: A Fabulous Midcentury Modern Quiz
description:
Think you're a true fan of Mad Men? Test your knowledge of the iconic TV series set in the glamorous world of 1960s advertising.

This quiz will challenge you with questions about the show's characters, plotlines, and historical references. Can you identify the advertising agency where Don Draper works? Do you know the name of Peggy Olson's first child? And can you quote some of the show's most memorable lines?

This quiz is a must-play for any fan of Mad Men who wants to prove their ultimate knowledge of the series. So, gather your friends and see who's the ultimate Mad Man!
